Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, an IT Solutions and Services company, is seeking an experienced IT Sales Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying potential clients, promoting IT solutions, and contributing to our company's growth. As a sales specialist, you will be providing customized IT solutions to meet clients' evolving technology needs. We are looking for someone who is passionate about technology, has excellent communication skills, and a strong background in IT Sales.Identify potential clients and build long-term relationships with them.
Develop customized IT solutions to meet clients' specific IT needs.
Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.
Keep up-to-date with industry developments, trends, and competitor analysis.
Build and maintain strong relationships with our partner OEMs.
Participate in client presentations, trade shows, and events to promote Tbot Techno Systems' products and services.
Negotiations, closing deals, and ensuring profitability and customer satisfaction.Job Details
